title: Microsoft Data Shows It's Time to Empower Workers
itunes:title: Microsoft Data Shows It's Time to Empower Workers
description:
Jared Spataro, Corporate Vice President of Microsoft 365, discusses the Work Trend Index Special Report on how tech can help unlock a new future for frontline workers.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Katie Greifeld. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
